help-file.title: HELP
help-file.content:
The "help" command lets you access things like this entry. Type "help" alone to see a list of major topics.
Duris DikuMUD - Main Help Menu
Type: Produces: HELP....................This screen HELP INDEX..............Help File Index HELP POLICIES and.......Master list of Duris Policies and rules. These HELP RULES are a *must* read for all players. HELP <keyword>..........Information on a policy, command, skill or spell HELP COMMANDS...........List of the most frequently used commands (on most Dikus, the original HELP screen) NEWS....................Up to date information on Duris COMMANDS................List of *all* available commands, including SOCIAL ACTIONS INFO....* NEW! *........The INFO help screen. FAQ.....* NEW! *........The FAQ (Duris's Frequently Asked Questions) 컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴컴 Duris help is divided into two sections: HELP and INFO. The HELP section deals with the everyday functions, policies and stuff you need to know in order to play successfully here on Duris. The INFO section gives you the background on each of the gods here, and will be expanded to include the general background on each of the mobs (monsters) you may encounter here.
